name: Blue: Keep him Alive
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 46.

Blue the rectangle is drunk and the aim of the game is to hep him get home safely. Use you mouse to left click on deadly obstacles in Blue's path and get him home safely.

Basic game play is there, but I did not have enough time to create a main character asset and polish it.

If I had more time I would have added extra levels and assets.

Anyway, hope you Enjoy this very short game :)
